title: Team up for Party Rewards before they’re gone!

replies.body: Didn't Rito say something about this being a test. At least i hope so...{{champion:32}}
I have gotten about 20 ip from these team bonuses from about 20 games when queuing with at least 2 other people each game...
yeah i agree the rewards are worse than they sound
Why are you removing them ??????????/ {{champion:266}} <----y face right now
